text: Hi, I have a commerce web platform and I want to add my platform to the HubSpot Marketplace. Can you provide guidance on how to do this?
Hey <@U07ARR6C25S> - You are going to need to open an in-app customer service ticket to initiate a provider name change.

Hello HubSpotters :wave::skin-tone-2: !

:awesome: Great news in the world of themes today. The restriction on membership templates has been removed for themes. So, if you have been thinking of building membership themes or just wanted to add membership templates to your existing theme, there are no restrictions on doing so. The current theme requirements can be found <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/theme-requirements|here>.

Please note, the use of membership templates is only possible with Content Hub Professional and above. If you are looking to build a membership theme where it would be absolutely necessary to use the membership templates, you would need to mention that in your theme’s overview on your listing page. For example: “_This theme requires the use of membership templates that are only available in Content Hub Professional and above”._
Amazing news <@U02094DEMTK>! Let's build membership pages! Woohoo
That is so sick, thanks for the news!!
